section.name: The evolving nature of human-computer interaction

Promising technologies for improving computing performance
Exponential doubling of computing speed will continue through 2030
Ubiquitous computing and personal networks will become common
Voice-based interfaces will continue to gain acceptance
Continuous health monitoring and personalized medicine will become routine
A limited form of virtual reality gaming will become popular
Intelligent assistants will become more intelligent
Self driving cars will start to appear on our roadways
Photorealistic virtual actors will start to appear
Artificial general intelligence will be achieved in supercomputers
Human level artificial general intelligence will be common
Fully immersive virtual reality will appear
Ray Kurzweilaposs singularity will not take place by 2050, or even by 2100
